abstract: As the market reels from the implosion of the subprime mortgage market, taking down profits at banking giants like HSBC, another notable company could face trouble. The New York Post reports that Cerberus Capital Management‘s 51 percent stake in GMAC could pose problems for the investment firm, along with its partners Citigroup and Aozora Bank.
lead_paragraph: As the market reels from the implosion of the subprime mortgage market, taking down profits at banking giants like HSBC, another notable company could face trouble. The New York Post reports that Cerberus Capital Management‘s 51 percent stake in GMAC could pose problems for the investment firm, along with its partners Citigroup and Aozora Bank.

headline.main: Subprime Mortgage Woes May Haunt Cerberus
